topics.body:
I'm kind of bummed right now.
The Brony Club that I go to every Friday got cancelled because the people running the club couldn't secure the room in time. We will be able to meet next week.

Also, my internet doesn't like me today. Keeps messing with me, and I have to keep reconnecting.
